attributes.action: Prevent the use of e-cigarettes/vaping on public transport and public areas
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.cancerresearchuk.org/health-professional/awareness-and-prevention/e-cigarette-hub/safety#E-cigs_safety3

Research suggests there is less harm caused by vapour than the fumes of actual cigarettes. Even if it is less there is still an amount.
attributes.background: The government are now discussing relaxing smoking/vaping of e-cigarettes namely on public transport and it should not be allowed. Smoking/vaping is a selfish habit of few and it should not be imposed to non smokers/vapers. It should be the rights of non smokers to be able to avoid such habits.
